name: Iced (itch)
description:
Enemies are invading your camp. Protect it and avoid freezing

Iced is a platform shoot em' up game, where the player needs to fight against endless hordes of enemies, while being careful to not freeze to death.

Shoot all enemies on the screen and fight against ruthless bosses, while using the bonfires to warm yourself up.

Challenge your friends to beat your score!

This game was made in 7 days for a game jam with the theme: Temperature.

Controls:

WASD or Arrows: Movement

Space: Jump

Mouse: Shoot

R key: Restart the game

Credits

Made by: TemptyOne

This game wouldn't be possible without those guys:

Sound effects: Juhani Junkala

Musics: Abstraction, Joshua Mclean
